/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene rural scene under a clear blue sky. A dirt road, the color of rich coffee, cuts through the center of the image, inviting the viewer's gaze to follow its path. On either side of the road, lush greenery flourishes, providing a vibrant contrast to the earthy tones of the road. 

In the distance, a small building with a red roof nestles comfortably amidst the greenery, adding a touch of human presence to the otherwise untouched landscape. The sun, a radiant orb of light, shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene and enhancing the overall tranquility of the setting.

The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the dirt road, looking up at the expansive blue sky. The combination of natural and man-made elements creates a harmonious balance, reflecting the quiet beauty of rural life.
